instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
threads.message:
Hi, i have a 820-4924 not turning on.. no water damage, no corrosion. nothing.

I think is stuck at S5 state. But I don’t know where start look why is stuck in there.

There my measures.

PPBUS_G3H @ C7900 : 12.56v
PP3V42_G3H @ C4850 : 3.42v
PPVRTC_G3H @ C1910 : 3.33v
PP5V_S5 @ C7505 : 5.05V
PP5V_S4 @ 0v
PP5V_S3 @0v
PP3V3_S5 @ C8000 : 3.33v
PP3V3_S4 @ 0v
PP3V3_S3 @ 0v 
SMC_RESET_L @ R5100 : 3.36v

The board looks very well.. I dont know where start looking.

threads.title: 820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
threads.message: Green/orange light working? Using a 60W charger?

threads.title: 820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
threads.message: I try some chargers.. include the original 60w and 85w. Same result.. with any charger have green light / orange light on the charger but doesn't turns on.

threads.title: 820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
threads.message: I have exactly the same issue!

threads.title: 820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
threads.message: How is PM_SLP_S4_L doing? Anything ugly around U1900?

threads.title: 820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
threads.message:
Is nothing ugly. i have some boards with the same issue. all of them are retinas non touch bar.

PM_SLP_S4_L is 0v

i dont know works the thinks with the PM_SLP_S4_L.. what i need first? where need to look? why always stuck in the S5 State? should be the PCH? i don't know !!

threads.title: 820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
threads.message: I think some 4924 boards need a good battery connected to boot.

threads.title: 820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
threads.message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 24826"]I think some 4924 boards need a good battery connected to boot.[/QUOTE]

This is happening to me with several models of macbook pro retina non touchbar. not only with the 4924. i will going to proof and i let u know how im going.

threads.title: 820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
threads.message: Check all rails for shorts, PPVRTC present? U1900/U1950 corrosion?

threads.title: 820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
threads.message: PPVRTC is present, No corrosion on neither

threads.title: 820-4924 with green/orange light but not turning on.
threads.message: No idea, could be anything. Need history, this usually does not just happen.
